name: cotton candy parade blanket
sizes_available: the free pattern is for a baby blanket measuring 37" x 37", but the pdf includes 6 additional sizes (lapghan - 43" x 50", small throw - 50" x 63", medium throw - 56" x 69", large throw - 63" x 82", queen - 89" x 89", king - 95" x 95"), along with instruct
notes:
colorful moss stitch granny squares come together to create a beautiful blanket that you can snuggle in for years to come. 

there is so much to love about this blanket:

* made up of individual moss stitch granny squares that are joined together as you crochet! this makes it a portable project and there is no sewing involved.

* it uses the moss stitch (a combination of single crochets and chain-1 spaces that is both relaxing and addicting).

* self-striping yarn (specifically mandala ombre) is used to add bursts of colour to your project without doing any extra work.

> the free pattern for the baby blanket size (37” x 37”), can be found **[here.][1]**

> buy 2 patterns, get 1 free with coupon code: freepattern. add all 3 patterns to your cart and use the coupon code. discount will be applied at checkout.

skill level: intermediate

language: english

crochet terminology: us terms

stitches: chain, single crochet, double crochet (border - optional)

sizes:
the **[free pattern][2]** is for a baby blanket - 37” x 37”.
the pdf includes 7 blanket sizes, along with instructions to create a custom-sized blanket:

baby blanket (37” x 37”)
lapghan (43” x 50”)
small throw (50” x 63”)
medium throw (56” x 69”)
large throw (63” x 82”)
queen (89” x 89”)
king (95” x 95”)

other details:

* 5.5mm crochet hook needed
* medium 4 worsted weight yarn is used for this design.
* pattern has been tech edited!
* the pdf includes step-by-step pictures!
* the printable pdf is a total of 19 pages.

i hope you enjoy making and using your blanket(s)!


  [1]: https://thispixiecreates.com/moss-stitch-granny-square-crochet-blanket/
  [2]: https://thispixiecreates.com/moss-stitch-granny-square-crochet-blanket/
